definitions.definition: To make particular, as opposed to general; to restrict to a specific or individual case, class etc.; to single out .
To be specific about (individual instances); to go into detail (about), to specify .
To differentiate , make distinct from others.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To make particular, as opposed to general; to restrict to a specific or individual case, class etc.; to single out .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , intransitive ) To be specific about (individual instances); to go into detail (about), to specify .
( intransitive ) To differentiate , make distinct from others.
